document_data.name: Nautilus
document_data.mainbody: '''Nautili''' were [[squid]]-like creatures with large shells. They were thought to typically believed to be deep sea dwellers, though they foraged for food in the shallower waters of the [[Sea of Moving Ice]].
document_data.Subspecies:
[[Frost giant]]s of the Sea of Moving Ice sometimes carved runes into the shells of nautili, creating what were known as runechanged nautiloids, which produced magically conductive [[ink]].

Giant nautili appeared in the [[Elemental Plane of Water]], as well as [[upper planes|upper planar]] oceans such as [[Lunia]], [[Thalasia]], and [[Ossa]]. Some giant nautili even swam in the depths of a few oceans of the [[Prime Material plane]].{{Cite dragon/193/The Dragon's Bestiary: They came from the Outer Planes!|96}}
document_data.Uses: Nautilus shells were valued by collectors, with prime specimens netting 5 [[currency|gp]]. [[Triton]]s sometimes used nautilus shells to channel arcane magic, in lieu of i.e. [[wand]]s. The [[Temple of Ten Thousand Gods]] used a nautilus shell as its symbol.
document_data.Trivia: Some [[sea elves]] were known to craft and wear jewelry that was shaped like nautili.
